title: I GOT HEXTECH ANNIE
body: WOOHOO only costed me 800 rp to get the essence because i couldn't wait :D

replies.body:
I got a gemstone yesterday, but I don't really buy RP, so my hopes of getting 10 gemstones is pretty rare. So I just traded it for a chest+key and got Deadly Kennen (Legacy)
